name: lattice_polynomial_factorization
chinese_name: 浅谈格算法在整系数多项式分解中的应用
author: 谢梓涵
complexity: O(n^6 log^3 B) for time, O(n^2 log B) for space, where n is the degree and B bounds the coefficient size.
summary: The paper discusses the application of lattice algorithms, particularly the LLL algorithm, to factor integer-coefficient polynomials. It reduces polynomial factorization to finding short vectors in a lattice constructed from the polynomial's coefficients and uses properties of lattices to recover non-trivial factors efficiently.
